location: Shilin District, near a riverside walking path (possibly Shuangxi or Waishuangxi creek area)
notes: Well-maintained modern apartment in a high-rise building (11 floors) with elegant lobby entrance and recessed lighting. The living room features updated fixtures, built-in cabinetry, warm LED lighting, and clean wood-tone flooring — very clean and move-in ready. The balcony has glass-panel railings with metal frames at a reasonable height, but the glass lower portion and horizontal bars could be a concern for a climbing toddler — baby-proofing the balcony access would be essential. The neighborhood appears pleasant with a riverside walking path and greenery nearby, good for stroller walks.
